issue.title: [Rust] Removed unused BinaryArrayBuilder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10422](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10422). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The trait BinaryArrayBuilder is not used anywhere, and I think that it is an artifact from old code. Consider removing it.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10422?focusedCommentId=17225640) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8550
